summary: So, assuming we really are looking at the dawn of a pokemon cinematic universe with Detective Pikachu, what other pokemon games...
question: So, assuming we really are looking at the dawn of a pokemon cinematic universe with Detective Pikachu, what other pokemon games or other media would you like to see made into a live action movie in future?
answer:
Rumour has it Warner Bros and Legendary want to do a Mewtwo spin-off movie and a film based on Red and Blue, so I’d be interested to see how those turn out.

Other than that, I’d really like to see a movie based on Pokémon Colosseum and XD, or one based on the Pokémon Ranger games. I think the basic plots and concepts from those could easily be re-worked into good movies.

Other than that, I’m not really sure exactly what I’d want to see adapted. I’ll just see what they come up with, we already know there’s a sequel to Detective Pikachu in the works so I’ll just wait and see how things develop.

reblog.comment:
Rumour has it Warner Bros and Legendary want to do a Mewtwo spin-off movie and a film based on Red and Blue, so I’d be interested to see how those turn out.

Other than that, I’d really like to see a movie based on Pokémon Colosseum and XD, or one based on the Pokémon Ranger games. I think the basic plots and concepts from those could easily be re-worked into good movies.

Other than that, I’m not really sure exactly what I’d want to see adapted. I’ll just see what they come up with, we already know there’s a sequel to Detective Pikachu in the works so I’ll just wait and see how things develop.

trail.content_raw:
Rumour has it Warner Bros and Legendary want to do a Mewtwo spin-off movie and a film based on Red and Blue, so I’d be interested to see how those turn out.

Other than that, I’d really like to see a movie based on Pokémon Colosseum and XD, or one based on the Pokémon Ranger games. I think the basic plots and concepts from those could easily be re-worked into good movies.

Other than that, I’m not really sure exactly what I’d want to see adapted. I’ll just see what they come up with, we already know there’s a sequel to Detective Pikachu in the works so I’ll just wait and see how things develop.
trail.content:
Rumour has it Warner Bros and Legendary want to do a Mewtwo spin-off movie and a film based on Red and Blue, so I’d be interested to see how those turn out.

Other than that, I’d really like to see a movie based on Pokémon Colosseum and XD, or one based on the Pokémon Ranger games. I think the basic plots and concepts from those could easily be re-worked into good movies.

Other than that, I’m not really sure exactly what I’d want to see adapted. I’ll just see what they come up with, we already know there’s a sequel to Detective Pikachu in the works so I’ll just wait and see how things develop.

summary: I know y'all are excited to see if your fave pokemon will be in Detective Pikachu and I am to but I really want to see if they...
body:
I know y'all are excited to see if your fave pokemon will be in Detective Pikachu and I am to but I really want to see if they have an Officer Jenny and a Nurse Joy in the movie.

Want Jenny to come riding in on an Arcanine and screaming on her megaphone all extra over just some mundane thing like a shop lifter

I want Nurse Joy to heal Detective Pikachu and be like “hope to see you again” and Detective Pikachu being like “wtf is wrong with u?”

summary: i keep seeing people criticizing detective pikachu for keeping the designs of the pokemon relatively the same while adding...
body:
i keep seeing people criticizing detective pikachu for keeping the designs of the pokemon relatively the same while adding realistic elements/textures, and saying that they should’ve made them look like real life animals instead

but guys, they wouldn’t be pokemon anymore if they did that. they’d just be reskinned animals.

reblog.comment:

summary: Me: The “girl that actually turns out to be a guy” trope is kind of transphobic and using that as a joke is really harmful...
body:
Me: The “girl that actually turns out to be a guy” trope is kind of transphobic and using that as a joke is really harmful towards the trans community and it’s used by even the best of people even if they don’t mean it any harm.

Also me: Please let Jigglypuff be a deep-voiced man when they speak to Pikachu
